name: POPKID-MD
description: THE FIRST BOT IN ENGLISH LANGUAGE❤️

SESSION_ID.description: If you linked your WhatsApp using Pair or QR code, you received a code on WhatsApp. Copy that code and paste it in the box below.

PREFIX.description: Choose a symbol to run your bot, e.g., . ! ? : & . Write one of them in the box below. Your bot will respond using that symbol.

MODE.description: If you want only yourself to use the bot, write private below. If you want everyone to use it, write below.

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: If you want the bot to appear online 24/7, write true ✅ below. If not, write false ❎.

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: When someone uploads a status, it will be automatically seen by the bot. If you want this feature ON, write true below. If you want it OFF, write false.

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: If you want the bot to react automatically after seeing a status, write true below. If you only want it to see without reacting, write false below.

OWNER_NAME.description: Write the name of the person who will use the bot.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Enter the WhatsApp number of the bot owner. Only this number will have full access to all bot commands. Others won’t be able to use restricted commands.

ANTI_LINK.description: If anyone sends a link in the group, the bot will delete it and remove that person. To enable this feature, write true below. To disable it, write false.

WELCOME.description: If you want the bot to send a welcome message when a new member joins a group, write true below. To disable, write false.

READ_MESSAGE.description: If you want the bot to automatically mark all messages as read (even in groups), write true below. To turn it off, write false.

AUTO_RECORDING.description: If you want others to see the 'recording audio...' status whenever the bot is active, write true below. Otherwise, write false.

AUTO_TYPING.description: If you want others to see the 'typing...' status whenever the bot is active, write ❮true❯ below. Otherwise, write ❮false❯.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Enter your Heroku API key from your Heroku account settings.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter the Heroku app name of your bot here.
